    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      public static Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      Generate the arrangement of the brick in 3 lines with the selected type of brick
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the size of this component
      brickCnt - the bricks will be generated
      lineCnt - the lines that contains the bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the brick size ratio
      type - the type of brick
      Returns:
      the arrangement of bricks

    • makeChessboardLevel

      public static Brick[] makeChessboardLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      Generate the arrangement of the brick in 3 lines with the selected types of brick
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the size of this component
      brickCnt - the bricks will be generated
      lineCnt - the lines that contains the bricks
      brickSizeRatio - the brick size ratio
      typeA - the type of first brick
      typeB - the type of second brick
      Returns:
      the arrangement of bricks

    • makeLevels

      public static Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      Generate different levels of brick arrangement and store in temp
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the size of the component
      brickCount - the bricks will be generated
      lineCount - the lines contains the bricks
      brickDimensionRatio - the brick size ratio
      Returns:
      a 2d array of bricks
